synopsis.text: While conquering the highest peaks on Earth, including Mt. Everest, two daring adventurers, Saruwatari Gorou and Jack F. 'Lostman' Woodbridge, set their sights on the next frontier: space. When a powerful new energy source, Helium 3, is discovered on the moon, NASA initiates Project Nexus to harness this energy for Earth's benefit. Driven by ambition and the desire to conquer space, Gorou and Lostman embark on separate paths to achieve their shared dream. Gorou becomes a skilled construction specialist, while Lostman joins the air force, both working tirelessly to secure their place among the stars. As the International Space Agency unites the world's space programs, the race is on to build fifteen nuclear reactors on the moon by 2023. Follow Gorou and Lostman as they overcome challenges and defy the odds in their pursuit of the ultimate conquest â€“ space exploration.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
